isSelected

select

public void select(int x,
                   int y)
Selects the unit at the coordinates given as parameters. If there is more than one unit, it selects the first found at the given coordinate in the units ArrayList and adds it to selectedUnits.

Parameters:
x -
y -

target

public void target(int x,
                   int y)
Sets target to the given x/y coordinates, but only workers. If selectedUnits only contains workers, sets a resource as target

y -
